BeforeGame.Narration: Do remember that the gravity in Jump Space is especially low in gravity.

InGame.CharacterA: Ughhhhhhh(|||*д*) It's still weekend. I am off duty today.
InGame.CharacterB: A new <color=red>delivery</color> request from me, young lady.
InGame.CharacterA: Of course, Mr. president! But emmmmmm. Where's the <color=red>package</color>?
InGame.CharacterB: There're in all three packages. I have one for you, but you will need to claim the rest two yourself from the Gravity Space and Dash Space.
InGame.CharacterA: Pardon? I suppose that Sam Express isn't an inter-space company.
InGame.CharacterB: Listen, kid. See the sign above you? And all this distorted space? Limit Force does that.
It's a very ancient power, existing even before the <color=#a52a2aff><size=50>Moving-Verse</size></color> that we live in.
We used to seal it with the Space Hearts. But now they are repatriated back to us somehow.
I need you to take the <color=red>heart</color> of our space, combine it with the other space's heart and go to the <color=purple>sanctuary</color> to seal the <color=purple>Limit Core</color> again.
Cause your boss is the legendary Sam Porter!
Bro, you can see that the area ahead has mixed up three sorts of areas in a row. Use your little brain to figure out a combo to glide through the barriers. I'm sure you get this.
